content: Ibaslogic was developed by Ibas Majid, a self-taught web developer, technical writer and advocate of project-based learning. Ibas is an author at LogRocket. He teaches JavaScript, React, GraphQL, Gatsby and WordPress theme development. And he has helped companies of different sizes grow their businesses by providing dev solutions.
If you have a web dev gig for him. You can get in touch to discuss your web project. You can also send a direct message via ibas@ibaslogic.com or find him on Twitter @ibaslogic.
